import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-cv', templateUrl: './cv.component.html', styleUrls: ['./cv.component.css'] }) export class CvComponent { } Document
What really matters is your skill to solve problems.
PERSONAL DETAILS
Birth July 20, 1997
Phone +502 35694354
Email lmdcma27@gmail.com
EDUCATION
Grade in Applied Physic
Universidad de San Carlos de Guatemala, Guatemala. 2016-2022
Grade in Applied Mathematics
Universidad de San Carlos de Guatemala, Guatemala. 2018-2022
WORK EXPERIENCE
Data Analyst, INE Guatemala Aug 2022-Feb 2023.
Calculate the Price Consumer Index (IPC) and inflation rate of my country, Power BI dashboards and data warehouse. All with python, pandas and sql server.
Data Engineer, FenixCorp Feb 2023-Present.
LANGUAGES
Spanish Mother Tongue
English Middle
SOFTWARE
Python Numpy, Pandas, Matplotlib, Sklearn, Tensorflow, django.
Javascript NodeJS, Angular, DataForge.
SQL Aggregation functions, Store procedures, subqueries, views, pivot, unpivot, backup, restore.
Others Docker, Power BI, LATEX, Office.
CERTIFICATIONS

2022 Deep Learning with Tensorflow for Machine Learning and AI(Udemy)
